title: HIPAA Privacy Rule – Right to Access Health Information

source.publisher: U.S. Department of Health & Human Services (HHS)

contentBlocks.excerpt: Except as otherwise provided…, an individual has a right of access to inspect and obtain a copy of protected health information about the individual… for as long as the information is maintained in the designated record set.
contentBlocks.rationale: Establishes legal and ethical rights of individuals to control, view, and retrieve their health data.
contentBlocks.notes: Central to healthcare transparency, digital health ethics, and personal data governance in the U.S.
